name: 卢克·大卫·扬
name_full: 卢克·大卫·扬 Luke David Young
birth_place: 英国,北爱尔兰，贝尔法斯特
introduction: Luke David Young is a Northern Irish actor & an Irish Boston transplant who originally hails from Belfast. Luke Worked extensively with the "The Helen O'Grady Drama Academy" and "The Rainbow Factory" throughout his early years of acting and training in Belfast. He began working with various Theater and Film projects until he realized his calling was for the United States. Since Moving to the United States, Luke Moved to Boston, Massachusetts where he felt at home with his Irish natives and which he still to this day calls his "Second Home". Luke has worked with numerous Film/TV and Theater Directors. He has worked with the likes of "Muffie Meyer" in "Mysteries of Matter" known for "Grey Gardens" and Wes Anderson in "Moonrise Kingdom. Luke recently just wrapped "You" with A&E Network. Luke has a fascination with his culture and hopes someday to be able to travel back to his homeland to make a film to capture the true nature of growing up in a divided country by Sectarianism throughout the Troubles.Trade Mark (3)His Large "6ft 5" HeightCompared to a "Young Liam Neeson"His "Northern Irish" Accent
